unnormalised: I remember being so stressed during my final exams at IIT Delhi. A friend suggested a meditation app. At first, I was skeptical – like, how would an app help with exam pressure like in "3 Idiots"? But honestly, it made a difference! Even just 10 minutes a day helped calm the nerves. Still, nothing beats chai and samosas with friends, right?
